title: The Initiation - An Erotic Werewolf Story
description: Nikki wants to be in the pack, no matter what it takes. But, it's only open to a select few, because it's an absolute killer to get into. She must pass a series of initiations if she wants to join, and it's lucky she doesn't mind the taste of female flesh, because she's about to have her fill.The last stage of the initiation is simple. She is chained together with her last competitor Lisa. She must do everything she can to make Lisa give in to her pleasures, and it is lucky for her she knows exactly what she wants.Nikki thinks she has won as the chain bites into Lisa's flesh and she shudders her release around her. But eleven hungry Werewolves are staring at her as though she will be the next one to be eaten and she realizes with a sudden clarity she may have made a very bad decision indeed.
author: Kim Faulks
